content: 11 twist your sts using mc round 1-10 k1 p1 round 50 - 59 repeat row 11 round 11 k3 p1 using cc round 12-20 repeat row 11 round 60-62 repeat row 11 using cc using mc round 21 - 23 repeat row 11 round 63-72 repeat row 11 using mc using cc round 24 - 33 repeat row 11 round 73-75 repeat row 11 using cc using mc round 34-36 repeat row 11 round 76-85 repeat row 11 using mc using cc round 37-46 repeat row 11 round 86-95 k1 p1 bind off with your preferred method weave in ends copyright you may make and sell items using this pattern but please list me as the designer do not copy and paste this pattern and claim it as your own you may share photos of your finished pieces but please do not share photos of my finished pieces and claim them as your own www mandismakings com | ourmakings@gmail com | @mandismakings | #waymakercowl 3 waymaker cowl design by amanda massingill congratulations on completing your cowl i can t wait to see your finished project don t forget to share your photos on social media and tag us on instagram @mandismakings and use #waymakercowl for pattern support please send an email to ourmakings@gmail com or send me a dm on instagram i would be happy to answer any questions you have have a great time knitting copyright you may make and sell items using this pattern but please list me as the designer do not copy and paste this pattern and claim it as your own you may share photos of your finished pieces but please do not share photos of my finished pieces and claim them as your own www mandismakings com | ourmakings@gmail com | @mandismakings | #waymakercowl 4
